thread.title: Ann Elizabeth Taylor
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Ann Elizabeth Taylor

author: Ann Elizabeth Taylor
title: Ann Elizabeth Taylor
text: My brother was going on holiday so I decided I would give his bedroom a complete overhaul as a surprise. Anyway I decided, for the first time, to take the measurements myself. I know it's not rocket science but I am pretty scatty. I went ahead with it and hoped for the best and that is exactly what I got, a very informative website, emails from Blinds 2go keeping me up-to-date on the progress , excellent secure packaging and a perfect fitting blind. I won't hesitate to use Blinds 2go in the future and would thoroughly recommend them and feel more confident myself in measuring. My brother is home soon and he is going to be thrilled . Thank you Blinds 2go.
